title: The most affordable digital cameras by average price
summary: This chart shows the Average of price at the from Camera Memoto to Konica .
\\n From the chart we see that the Average of price were 75.9 , at their highest in Cambo .
\\n The price slowly declined over the next 3 - 4 Camera to 53.5 in Konica .
gold: The graph illustrates the five most affordable digital camera brands , represented by their average price in pounds sterling . The most affordable of these camera is Konica with an average price of 54 pounds . This is followed by Hunten ( 58 pounds ) Sigma ( 62 pounds ) and Memoto at 70 pounds .
